oracleReaderQuery.value:
WITH MissingTags AS (
    SELECT TAG_NO 
    FROM SCM_ADMIN.VIEW_CAB_PRINT_TAG
    MINUS
    SELECT TAG_NO 
    FROM SCM_ADMIN.ESB_CAB_PRINT_TAG
    WHERE ROWNUM <= '1000'
)
SELECT
    NVL(V.BBS_NO, ' ') AS BBS_NO,
    NVL(V.PROD_MARKING, ' ') AS PROD_MARKING,
    NVL(V.PROJ_NAME, ' ') AS PROJ_NAME,
    NVL(V.BBS_DESC, ' ') AS BBS_DESC,
    NVL(V.LOAD_DATE, ' ') AS LOAD_DATE,
    NVL(V.RUN_NO, ' ') AS RUN_NO,
    NVL(V.SHAPECODE, ' ') AS SHAPECODE,
    NVL(V.WEIGHT, 0) AS WEIGHT,
    NVL(V.PIN_SIZE, 0) AS PIN_SIZE,
    NVL(V.TAG_QTY, 0) AS TAG_QTY,
    NVL(V.ITEM_TOTAL_QTY, 0) AS ITEM_TOTAL_QTY,
    NVL(V.INV_LEN, 0) AS INV_LEN,
    NVL(V.GRADE_DIA, ' ') AS GRADE_DIA,
    NVL(V.WORKCENTER, ' ') AS WORKCENTER,
    NVL(V.Q_PO_NO, ' ') AS Q_PO_NO,
    NVL(V.TAG_NO, ' ') AS TAG_NO,
    NVL(V.BENDING_SEQ_NO, ' ') AS BENDING_SEQ_NO,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_1, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_1,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_1, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_1,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_1, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_1,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_1, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_1,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_1, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_1,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_2, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_2,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_2, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_2,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_2, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_2,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_2, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_2,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_2, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_2,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_3, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_3,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_3, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_3,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_3, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_3,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_3, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_3,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_3, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_3,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_4, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_4,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_4, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_4,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_4, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_4,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_4, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_4,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_4, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_4,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_5, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_5,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_5, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_5,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_5, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_5,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_5, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_5,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_5, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_5,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_6, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_6,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_6, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_6,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_6, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_6,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_6, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_6,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_6, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_6,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_7, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_7,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_7, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_7,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_7, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_7,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_7, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_7,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_7, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_7,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_8, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_8,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_8, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_8,

    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_8, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_8,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_8, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_8,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_9, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_9,

    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_11, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_11,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_11, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_11,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_11, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_11,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_11, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_11,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_11, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_11,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_12, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_12,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_12, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_12,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_12, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_12,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_12, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_12,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_12, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_12,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_13, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_13,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_13, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_13,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_13, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_13,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_13, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_13,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_13, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_13,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_14, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_14,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_14, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_14,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_14, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_14,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_14, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_14,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_14, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_14,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_15, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_15,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_15, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_15,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_15, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_15,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_15, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_15,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_15, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_15,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_16, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_16,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_16, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_16,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_16, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_16,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_16, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_16,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_16, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_16,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_17, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_17,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_17, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_17,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_17, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_17,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_17, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_17,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_17, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_17,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_18, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_18,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_18, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_18,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_18, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_18,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_18, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_18,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_18, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_18,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_19, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_19,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_19, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_19,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_19, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_19,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_19, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_19,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_19, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_19,
    NVL(V.SEGMENT_LENGTH_20, ' ') AS SEGMENT_LENGTH_20,
    NVL(V.SHAPE_PARAM_20, ' ') AS SHAPE_PARAM_20,
    NVL(V.PARAM_IND_20, ' ') AS PARAM_IND_20,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_X_20, ' ') AS COORDINATE_X_20,
    NVL(V.COORDINATE_Y_20, ' ') AS COORDINATE_Y_20,
    NVL(V.LOAD_NO, ' ') AS LOAD_NO,
    NVL(V.TIME_STAMP_CREATION, ' ') AS TIME_STAMP_CREATION,
    NVL(V.TIME_STAMP_UPDATE, ' ') AS TIME_STAMP_UPDATE,
    NVL(V.ORDER_DATE, ' ') AS ORDER_DATE,
    NVL(V.DELIVERY_DATE, ' ') AS DELIVERY_DATE,
    NVL(V.BEND_HR, ' ') AS BEND_HR,
    NVL(V.ORDER_NO, ' ') AS ORDER_NO,
    NVL(V.ITEM_NO, ' ') AS ITEM_NO,
    NVL(V.MAT_SOURCE_IND, ' ') AS MAT_SOURCE_IND,
    NVL(V.RELEASE_CODE, ' ') AS RELEASE_CODE,
    NVL(V.URGENT_IND, ' ') AS URGENT_IND,
    NVL(V.CONQUAS_IND, ' ') AS CONQUAS_IND,
    NVL(V.BVBS, ' ') AS BVBS,
    NVL(V.MAT_SOURCE, ' ') AS MAT_SOURCE,
    NVL(V.TAG_COUNTER, 0) AS TAG_COUNTER,
    NVL(V.TOTAL_TAGS, 0) AS TOTAL_TAGS,
    NVL(V.CUST_NAME, ' ') AS CUST_NAME,
    NVL(V.BBS_PAGE_NO, ' ') AS BBS_PAGE_NO,
    NVL(V.GROUP_TAG_ID, ' ') AS GROUP_TAG_ID,
    NVL(V.BBS_COLORCODE, ' ') AS BBS_COLORCODE,
    NVL(V.GROUP_TAG_IND, ' ') AS GROUP_TAG_IND,
    NVL(V.GROUP_TAG_TOTAL_TAGS, 0) AS GROUP_TAG_TOTAL_TAGS,
    NVL(V.PRODUCT_TYPE, ' ') AS PRODUCT_TYPE,
    NVL(V.CAGE_MARK, ' ') AS CAGE_MARK,
    NVL(V.CAGE_PIECES, 0) AS CAGE_PIECES,
    NVL(V.CAGING_WC, ' ') AS CAGING_WC,
    NVL( SUBSTR(V.CAGING_PLANNED_STARTTIME, 12, 5), ' ') AS CAGING_PLANNED_STARTTIME,
    NVL(V.CAGING_SEQ, 0) AS CAGING_SEQ
FROM 
    SCM_ADMIN.VIEW_CAB_PRINT_TAG V
JOIN 
    MissingTags M ON V.TAG_NO = M.TAG_NO

select TAG_NO from (select TAG_NO from SCM_ADMIN.VIEW_CAB_PRINT_TAG				
minus				
select TAG_NO from SCM_ADMIN.ESB_CAB_PRINT_TAG)				
where rownum <= 1000
